channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Better Tag Cloud
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Better Tag Cloud

item.title: CVE-2022-2412|2024-08-03T00:39:06.990Z -- unknown -- better%20tag%20cloud
item.description: The Better Tag Cloud WordPress plugin through 0.99.5 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
